languages.text: At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: В начале боя великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} получает 1 случайную неизвестную {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагему{/g}, которую может использовать до конца боя без затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text: At the start of combat the Strategist gains one random unknown stratagem and can use it until the end of combat for 0 AP.
At the start of combat the Strategist gains one random unknown stratagem and can use it until the end of combat for 0 AP.

At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: В начале боя великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} получает 1 случайную неизвестную {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагему{/g}, которую может использовать до конца боя без затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: В начале боя стратег получает 1 случайную неизвестную стратагему, которую может использовать до конца боя без затрат ОД.
В начале боя стратег получает 1 случайную неизвестную стратагему, которую может использовать до конца боя без затрат ОД.

languages.text: 每场战斗开始时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}随机获得一个未知{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}，可以在战斗结束前使用。此战略能力不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每场战斗开始时，战略大师随机获得一个未知战略能力，可以在战斗结束前使用。此战略能力不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Al comienzo del combate, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} desconocida aleatoria que podrá utilizar por 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo del combate, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} desconocida aleatoria que podrá utilizar por 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} ein zufälliges ihm unbekanntes {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategem{/g}, das er bis zum Ende des Kampfes für 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} nutzen kann.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} ein zufälliges ihm unbekanntes {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategem{/g}, das er bis zum Ende des Kampfes für 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} nutzen kann.

languages.text: Au début du combat, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grand stratège{/g} acquiert un {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagème{/g} inconnu aléatoire et peut l'utiliser jusqu'à la fin du combat pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Au début du combat, le Stratège acquiert un Stratagème inconnu aléatoire et peut l'utiliser jusqu'à la fin du combat pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は未知の{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}をランダムに1つ獲得し、戦闘終了までそれを{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}0で使用できる。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は未知の{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}をランダムに1つ獲得し、戦闘終了までそれを{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}0で使用できる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist{/g}, çatışmanın başında rastgele bilinmeyen bir {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}savaş hilesi{/g} kazanır ve onu çatışma bitimine dek 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedelle kullanabilir.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} gains one random unknown {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} and can use it until the end of combat for 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
